price: ផេ្សងពីអល់ឡោះមក។ ហើយចូរពួកអ្នកបង្ហាញពួកគេ ទៅកាន់ផ្លូវនរកជើហ៊ីមចុះ។
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
